scripts.dev:vue-meeting-selector: pnpm --filter vue-meeting-selector dev & pnpm --filter vue-meeting-selector-dev dev
scripts.dev:react-meeting-selector: pnpm --filter react-meeting-selector dev & pnpm --filter react-meeting-selector-dev dev
scripts.build: pnpm run build:vue-meeting-selector && pnpm run build:react-meeting-selector && pnpm run build:docs && pnpm run build:vue-meeting-selector-dev && pnpm run build:react-meeting-selector-dev
